name: Treepodia
tag_list: video, shopping, ecommerce, video-platform, retailers, platform
overview:
Founded in 2007, Treepodia is the leading ecommerce video platform with hundreds of clients and millions of high converting videos with millions of views. The company was voted the most popular automated video service by the top 500 companies as selected by the influential magazine Internet Retailer.

The Treepodia ecommerce video platform enables online merchants to cover their entire product catalogue with effective and engaging video content in just 24 hours.

As a comprehensive one-stop-shop video solution provider, Treepodia also offers such added value services as the Dynamic Video Sitemap for increased SEO and the Video Distributor for increased web exposure.

Worldwide clients include Walmart, Cnet, Procter & Gamble, Ice.com, OnlineGolf, NFL, Promovacances and more.
